pages.text: The Redstone Flux Cell can be used to store and distribute Redstone Flux (RF). Each side can be configured to in/output energy, and the cell can be configured to auto-input/output. The RF cell starts with 1,000,000RF storage capacity and 1,000rf/t max in/out, which can be improved using augments. Provides a comparator output proportional to how full it is.

The transfer rate of the RF cell can be precisely configured. In the GUI, on both sides of the RF gauge, are the input and output transfer rates. These can be set manually using the '+' and '-' buttons in order to precisely control the rate of RF transfer. Left/right clicking will change the rate by 50/10 rf per tick. Ctrl-clicking changes the rate by 5/1. Shift-clicking will instead change the rate by 1000/100. Ctrl-shift-clicking changes the rate by 10k/1k.
